title: when we create the policy, Verify that there is new constraints section called File Constraints tab visble under "ADD Criteria and Constraints section" section
custom_steps:
1.Deploy R122 or above build  and enable the license
2.Login to Tenant UI
3.Click on RealTime Protection under policies
4.Select  any category and select activity as Browse activity
5.Click on Add Criteria & Constraints section->File Constraints
6.Verfiy that the File name or File extension option available
custom_expected:
File constraints tab should be visible on the UI  and under it we should see following criteria's 
File Name or File Extensions
File Type
File size
